value:
$WmMPID_カリン,ch07_19_Karin_F_Normal,Face|Princess Sharena, I've decided to
help out the Order of Heroes!
With your blessing, of course.$k$pIf I can prevent even a single
casualty on the battlefield,
it will be more than worth it!$k$p$WmMPID_開花マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Bloom01,Face|I shall offer my aid as well. If my
blade can help protect others, I have
no qualms about joining the battle.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That's very kind of you both. Askr
can certainly use more strong
fighters like you!$k$p$WmMPID_アウグスト,ch07_17_August_M_Normal,Face|I have no connection to Askr, but I
understand that princes Leif and
Lewyn have offered their aid...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, yes! They have! Their
contributions to our cause have
already proven invaluable.$k$p$WmMPID_アウグスト,ch07_17_August_M_Normal,Face|As I would expect. The burden to
end the conflict raging in Thracia
rests on all our shoulders.$k$pThe sooner Prince Leif can
settle matters here and return
home, the better for everyone.$k$pTo that end, I pledge my service.
There is nothing I cannot do.
Leave everything to me.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh! If you're sure... We'd be lucky
to have you!$k$p$WmMPID_ガルザス,ch07_18_Garzas_M_Normal,Face|I have no duty to protect Askr,
but I am a mercenary.$k$pIf you pay my salary, my blade
is yours. Simple as that.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Right! I'll, um, ask the commander
how much is left in our coffers.$k$p$WmMPID_開花マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Bloom01,Face|...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_開花マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Bloom01,Face|$Fi1500|Father, might we speak a moment?$k$p$WmMPID_ガルザス,ch07_18_Garzas_M_Normal,Face|You have my ear.$k$p$WmMPID_開花マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Bloom01,Face|Now that we're together in Askr,
could you teach me the basics
of your swordplay technique?$k$p$WmMPID_ガルザス,ch07_18_Garzas_M_Normal,Face|You want me to teach the "basics"?$k$pI wasn't there when you needed me
most. I couldn't even perform the
basic responsibilities of fatherhood.$k$p$WmMPID_開花マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Bloom01,Face|I know, but—$k$p$WmMPID_ガルザス,ch07_18_Garzas_M_Normal,Face|Do you think someone like me could
teach you anything worthwhile?$k$p$WmMPID_開花マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Bloom01,Face|Well, I...$k$p$WmMPID_ガルザス,ch07_18_Garzas_M_Normal,Face|My sword is caked with blood,
Mareeta. No good will come of
any lesson I could teach you.$k$p$WmMPID_開花マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Bloom01,Face|Father! Wait!$k$p$WmMPID_アウグスト,ch07_17_August_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p
